Katelyn Skye presents, in one Complete Volume, her Romantic Thriller, 'Illicit Liaison'.

Illicit Liaison 1: Broken Contract
Darien Knight and Lolita Romanoff are the top thieves in the world who meet during a heist turned steaming sexual encounter, they think it is over but someone far more powerful than they could have ever imagined is busy pulling the strings to make sure these two stay together in order to steal a prize that is beyond priceless.

Illicit Liaison Book 2: Broken Contract
A ruthless mobster has forced Lolita and Darien into a daring heist. They must steal a ring from the lover of his rival or lose the things that they both hold most dear. For Darien that means his freedom and for Lolita it means her sister Jamie, but can they work together long enough to carry out the heist, or will the passion that explodes between them be the thing that brings them together?
